rows.label: tlk70000023_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah! It's good to see you youngsters.
You were a great help with those
little Nopon, you know.

rows.label: tlk70000023_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Ever since then, the little scamps have
been dropping by to see me all the
time.

rows.label: tlk70000023_03_msg0003
rows.name:
It feels as if I've acquired four more
grandchildren!

rows.label: tlk70000023_03_msg0004
rows.name:
My main worry is what'll happen to
them once I'm gone... I won't live
forever, after all.

rows.label: tlk70000023_03_msg0005
rows.name:
They need someone who'll look after
them without spoiling them rotten. But
where might one find such a person...?
